title: Gates Cambridge Scholarship
description: Prestigious scholarship for outstanding applicants from outside the UK to pursue a full-time postgraduate degree at Cambridge.

title: Fulbright Foreign Student Program
description: Provides grants for international students to study and conduct research in the United States at accredited institutions.

title: Erasmus Mundus Joint Masters
description: High-quality international study programmes jointly delivered by consortia of European higher education institutions.

title: DAAD Scholarship Germany
description: Offers scholarships for international students and researchers at German universities with excellent academic records.

title: Chevening Scholarships
description: UK government's global scholarship programme for future leaders to pursue one-year master's degrees in the UK.

title: Australia Awards Scholarship
description: Long-term development awards for citizens of participating countries to undertake full-time study at Australian universities.

title: Swiss Government Excellence Scholarships
description: Research scholarships for foreign scholars and artists holding a master's degree or equivalent university degree.

title: Rhodes Scholarship
description: The oldest and most celebrated international fellowship, bringing students from around the world to Oxford University.
